name: Finward Bancorp
description: Finward Bancorp is the holding company for First Financial Bank, a community bank serving diverse financial needs in the United States. Established in 1934, Finward Bancorp has a rich history of providing personalized banking services to both individuals and businesses. The company focuses on traditional banking services, including savings and checking accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. Finward Bancorp is dedicated to enhancing the financial well-being of its customers through tailored financial solutions and exceptional customer service. With a commitment to community involvement, the bank actively supports local initiatives and fosters economic development in the areas it serves. As a member of the FDIC, Finward Bancorp ensures that deposits are safe and secure, while also providing a range of digital banking options to meet the needs of modern consumers. The company is focused on leveraging technology to improve customer experience and streamline banking processes. Finward Bancorp is also committed to maintaining a strong capital position and delivering value to its shareholders through prudent financial management and strategic growth initiatives.

seo.meta_description: Learn about Finward Bancorp, the holding company for First Financial Bank, offering personalized banking services for individuals and businesses since 1934.

faq.question: What services does Finward Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Finward Bancorp offers personal banking, business banking, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Finward Bancorp?
faq.answer: Michael F. McCarthy is the CEO of Finward Bancorp.

faq.question: Where is Finward Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Finward Bancorp is headquartered in Munster, Indiana, USA.
